messages.messageBody:
"vv_2b" <vib6750@...> wrote:
>I'm going to ride the wave. Fighting it, takes too much energy.

Yes! That's what I was trying to say! Embrace the opportunity rather than hating and resisting.

---Meredith

messages.subject: Thank you and insight.
messages.msgSnippet: I d like to thank you all who responded to my post.  You all provided me with great insight and new ways to look at this situation. I think that what s going
messages.messageBody:
I'd like to thank you all who responded to my post. You all provided me with great insight and new ways to look at this situation. I think that what's going on is that I have to find another way to handle this...if life has taught me anything, it is that when something is giving me trouble, the answer is always change. It's time to change our routine, look out of the box, and introduce something different, because what was once working, is not anymore. I don't exactly know what I'm going to introduce around here, but I'm confident that I will figure it out. Bruce Lee, the martial artist/actor, said, be like water my friend - that's what I'm going to do. I'm going to ride the wave. Fighting it, takes too much energy.

V
